member.summary: Adds or removes the method that is executed when user input is correct.

member.summary: Adds or removes the method that is executed when user input is incorrect.

member.summary: Checks whether user input is valid or not.

member.summary: Gets or sets characters that can be used in CAPTCHA text.

member.summary: Gets or sets lenght of CAPTCHA image text. Use 0 to make it random.

member.name: P:DevGhoul.Controls.WebControls.CaptchaDotNet.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether input validation is case-sensitive.

member.summary: Gets or sets the time, in seconds, that generated image is valid for. 0 to make valid forever.

member.name: T:CaptchaDotNetObjects.Security.Cryptography.Encryptor
member.summary: Provides methods for encrypting and decrypting clear texts.

member.name: M:CaptchaDotNetObjects.Security.Cryptography.Encryptor.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypts a clear text using specified password and salt.
member.param: The password to create key for.
The salt to add to encrypted text to make it more secure.

member.name: M:CaptchaDotNetObjects.Security.Cryptography.Encryptor.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts an encrypted text using specified password and salt.
member.param: The password used to encrypt text.
The salt added to encrypted text.

member.summary: Creates a random salt to use in encryption.

member.summary: Generates random lenght random text.
member.param: A char array to use when creating the random text.

member.summary: Generates random text in specified lenght.
member.param: A char array to use when creating the random text.

member.summary: Generates a random non-negative number.

member.name: M:CaptchaDotNetObjects.Security.Cryptography.RNG.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a random non-negative number less than or equal to max.

member.name: M:CaptchaDotNetObjects.Security.Cryptography.RNG.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a random non-negative number bigger than or equal to min and less than or equal to max.
